Michigan Initial Health & Safety Training Module B
Section 1: Child Development

Developmental Milestones: 6 Months - 2 Years

  1. 6 Months:

    Social/Emotional

    • likes to play with others
    • responds to people’s emotions
    • likes to look at self in mirror

    Language/
    Communication

    • responds to sounds by making sounds
    • babbles vowels together
    • responds to own name

    Cognitive/Thinking

    • shows curiosity about things out of reach
    • brings things to mouth
    • begins to pass one hand to other

    Movement/Physical

    • rolls over in both directions
    • begins to sit without support
    • rocks back and forth

  2. 12 Months:

    Social/Emotional

    • shy with strangers
    • plays peek-a-boo
    • repeats sounds for attention

    Language/
    Communication

    • shaking head no or waving bye-bye
    • says “mama” & “dada”
    • tries to say words you say

    Cognitive/Thinking

    • bangs two things together
    • copies gestures
    • pokes with index finger

    Movement/Physical

    • pulls up to stand
    • gets to sitting position without help
    • may stand alone

  3. 18 Months:

    Social/Emotional

    • shows affection to familiar people
    • hands things to others
    • explores alone but with parents close

    Language/
    Communication

    • says several single words
    • points to show something he wants
    • says and shakes head “no”

    Cognitive/Thinking

    • follows one-step commands
    • points to one body part
    • scribbles on his own

    Movement/Physical

    • walks alone
    • eats with a spoon
    • may walk up steps and run

  4. 2 Years:

    Social/Emotional

    • copies adults & older children
    • shows defiant behavior
    • plays beside other children

    Language/
    Communication

    • says 2-4-word sentences
    • points to things in a book
    • follows simple instructions

    Cognitive/Thinking

    • begins to sort shapes & colors
    • builds 4 block tower
    • names simple items in book

    Movement/Physical

    • walks up & down stairs holding on
    • kicks a ball
    • begins to run
